alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued December 11 at 1:28PM PST until December 12 at 10:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...Riverside County Mountains and San Bernardino County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST Today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Low-water crossings may be flooded. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - A band of moderate rainfall will move across the mountains through early evening. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
